span.em: This page contains information pertaining to the impact of coronavirus on fine arts activities and events. Please check back often as the content will be continually updated.

span.br:
*All Region 2 UIL Music events have been cancelled for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. All practices and rehearsals of any kind have been suspended by UIL until further notice.
*District-owned instrument and uniform return information will be coming soon.
*Teachers are continuing to work diligently to provide quality online lessons that will allow students to continue their learning at home.
*All end of the year celebrations and banquets have been moved to an online format. Check with your program director for specific information.

br.span:
*All trips and competitions have been cancelled through the end of the year.
*Tryouts and auditions of any kind have been moved to an online format. Specific tryout information will come from the program directors or through campus communication. Tryouts for district-wide groups, such as middle school dance and cheer, will be communicated through NISD News emails.
*Private music lessons may continue online. This is at the discretion of the private lesson teacher and the student/parent. Online lessons may be scheduled directly with the private lesson teacher.
*Construction and renovations of fine arts facilities will continue during online learning and throughout the summer months. Check out the construction updates.
*Instrument selection and sizing for incoming 6th grade students enrolling in band and orchestra have moved to an online format. Specific information will be communicated through the program directors and the campuses. For more information on 6th grade instrument selection, please visit our website at www.nisdtx.org/finearts6thgradeinformation

div.p: Physical Address:2001 Texan Drive, Justin, Texas 76247
Mailing Address: PO Box 77070 Fort Worth TX 76177
Northwest ISD empowers learners and leaders to positively impact the world.

div.div: NISD is not responsible for content on external websites.

NISD affirms its commitment to ensuring people with disabilities have an equal opportunity to access online information and functionality. If you believe any online information or functionality is currently inaccessible, contact Melissa Shawn, communications and web specialist at 817-215-0135 or mshawn@nisdtx.org.
